title: Solve Intersection Equation
text: Set $$1+cos\left(\theta\right)=1-sin(\theta)$$. Simplify to find $$cos\left(\theta\right)+sin\left(\theta\right)=0$$. Solve for θ.

title: Use Unit Circle
text: Recall that $$cos\left(\theta\right)+sin\left(\theta\right)=0$$ corresponds to specific angles on the unit circle.
